matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

panels.description: Number of worker nodes in cluster
panels.title: Worker Node count

panels.description: NetworkUnavailable has Cilium/Calico as prerequisite - it is not working without it
panels.title: Nodes - NetworkUnavailable

targets.expr: count(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Succeeded"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Pending"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Failed"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Unknown"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="true"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="false"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="unknown"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster"} == 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster"} == 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_container_status_terminated{cluster="$Cluster"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_container_status_waiting{cluster="$Cluster"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
count(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster="$Cluster"} > 0 and on(pod) kube_pod_info{cluster="$Cluster", created_by_kind!="Job"}) or vector(0)
